instructions: Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 1 1 Open YouTube on your Android. It's the red square with a white play button inside. You'll usually find it in the app drawer. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 2 2 Find a playlist to download. You can search for a playlist by tapping the magnifying glass icon. To find a playlist you created, tap Library , and then scroll down to the Playlists section. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 3 3 Tap the playlist. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 4 4 Tap the download button. It's the round icon with a downward-pointing arrow inside. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 5 5 Select a video quality. This determines the picture and sound quality of the videos in the playlist. Choose Low , Medium , or HD . Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 6 6 Tap . Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 7 7 Tap to confirm. The playlist is now available offline. Advertisement

Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 8 1 Go to https://videoder.net in a web browser. Videoder is an app that allows you to download the videos in a YouTube playlist in any format you wish, including as Mp3s and other music files. You will have to install this app through your web browser because it's unavailable through the Play Store. This process involves giving your Android permission to install apps from unverified sources. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 9 2 Tap . It's on the Videoder homepage. A warning message will appear. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 10 3 Tap to confirm. The file will download to your Android. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 11 4 Open the file you just downloaded. It's called Videoder_v14.apk , though the version number will vary. You'll find it in the Downloads folder, which you can access by tapping Downloads in the in the app drawer. If you don't have a Downloads app, open your file manager app (usually called File Browser , File Manager , or My Files ), navigate to the Downloads folder, and tap Videoder_v14.apk . 5 Select on the Complete action using screen. 6 Tap . If this is the first time you've installed an app that isn't from the Play Store, a warning message will appear. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 14 7 Allow apps to be installed from unknown sources. If you see an Install option, move to the next step. If you see a warning that says Install blocked, here's how to proceed: Tap Settings to open the Security settings. Check the box next to Unknown sources. A confirmation message will appear. Tap OK . Return to the Downloads folder and tap Videoder_v14.apk again. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 15 8 Tap . The app will now install on your Android. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 16 9 Tap . It's at the bottom of the confirmation screen. Videoder will open for the first time. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 17 10 Search for (or enter the URL to) a YouTube playlist. You can use the search bar at the top of the screen to perform either of these functions. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 18 11 Tap the playlist you want to download. This opens the contents of the playlist. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 19 12 Tap the download button. It's a circle with a downward-pointing arrow inside. A list of download options will appear. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 20 13 Select a format for the files. Tap the drop-down menu next to Format / Resolution to choose the type of files to download. The default is M4A. Image titled Download a YouTube Playlist on Android Step 21 14 Tap . The files in the playlist will download to the Videoder file on your Android. Advertisement
